summary.para: Checks for overlay color space support.

param.name: Format
param.para: A -typed value for the color format.

param.name: ColorSpace
param.para: A -typed value that specifies color space type to check overlay support for.

param.name: pConcernedDevice
param.para: A pointer to the Direct3D device interface. CheckOverlayColorSpaceSupport returns only support info about this scan-out device.

param.name: pFlags
param.para: A pointer to a variable that receives a combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies options for overlay color space support.

returns.para: This method returns S_OK on success, or it returns one of the error codes that are described in the DXGI_ERROR topic.

summary.para: Represents an adapter output (such as a monitor). The IDXGIOutput4 interface exposes a method to check for overlay color space support.
